anger.quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
anger.author: Buddha

anger.quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
anger.author: Joel Osteen

anger.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
anger.author: Confucius

disgust.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
disgust.author: Helen Keller

disgust.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
disgust.author: John F. Kennedy

disgust.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
disgust.author: Milton Berle

joy.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
joy.author: Joseph Campbell

joy.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
joy.author: Dalai Lama

joy.quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
joy.author: Elbert Hubbard

fear.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.
fear.author: Sun Tzu

fear.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
fear.author: Plato

fear.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
fear.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

sadness.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
sadness.author: Confucius

sadness.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
sadness.author: Walt Disney

sadness.quote: It always seems impossible until its done.
sadness.author: Nelson Mandela
